properties.name: suspension.notification.enable
properties.description: Lock user account after a given idle period.

properties.name: suspension.notification.account.disable.delay
properties.displayName: Allowed idle time span in days
properties.description: Time period in days before locking the user account.

properties.name: suspension.notification.delays
properties.displayName: Alert sending time periods in days
properties.description: Send warning alerts to users before locking the account, after each period. Comma separated multiple values accepted.

properties.name: account.disable.handler.enable
properties.description: Allow an administrative user to disable user accounts

properties.name: account.disable.handler.notification.manageInternally
properties.description: Disable, if the client application handles notification sending

properties.name: Recovery.Question.Password.MinAnswers
properties.displayName: Number of questions required for password recovery

properties.name: Recovery.Question.Password.ReCaptcha.Enable
properties.displayName: Enable reCaptcha for security questions based password recovery
properties.description: Prompt reCaptcha for security question based password recovery

properties.name: Recovery.Notification.InternallyManage
properties.description: Disable if the client application handles notification sending

properties.name: Recovery.Question.Password.NotifyStart
properties.displayName: Notify when security questions based recovery starts

properties.name: Recovery.Notification.Password.ExpiryTime.smsOtp
properties.description: Expiration time of the SMS OTP code for password recovery

properties.name: Recovery.Question.Password.Forced.Enable
properties.description: Force users to provide answers to security questions during sign in

properties.name: Recovery.Question.MinQuestionsToAnswer
properties.displayName: Minimum number of forced security questions to be answered
properties.description: Force users to provide answers to security questions during sign in if user has answered lesser than this value

properties.name: Recovery.AdminPasswordReset.RecoveryLink
properties.displayName: Enable password reset via recovery e-mail
properties.description: User gets notified with a link to reset password

properties.name: Recovery.AdminPasswordReset.OTP
properties.description: User gets notified with a one time password to try with SSO login

properties.name: Recovery.AdminPasswordReset.Offline
properties.description: An OTP generated and stored in users claims
